item.title: Climate change impact assessment on the freshwater input to the coastal system of western Patagonia
item.description:
How will freshwater inputs to the coastal system of Western Patagonia change?

A very important question! I would like to believe that

We hypothesized that anthropogenic climate change will change the source and temporal patterns of freshwater inputs to the coastal system of western Patagonia, forcing lower, higher and equal inputs in north (41-46Â°S), central (46-51Â°S) and south Patagonia (51-56Â°S), respectively. Stay tuned for coming results ðŸ˜„
